ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and do not disgrace me on the Day they are raised up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And do not disgrace me on the day when they are raised from the graves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and disgrace me not on the Day when people will be raised to life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And do not disgrace me on the day when everyone will be raised.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And disgrace me not on the Day when they will be resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And disgrace me not on the day when they are raised
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Degrade me not upon the day when they are raised up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And abase me not on the day when they are raised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and do not disgrace me on the Day when all people are resurrected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And humiliate me not on the Day whereon people shall be raised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not disgrace me on the day that they will be resurrected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And let me not be in disgrace on the Day when (men) will be raised up;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And disgrace me not on the Day when (all the creatures) will be resurrected;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not degrade me on the Day when they are resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are resurrected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:87] And do not disgrace me, do not expose me, on the day when they, mankind, are resurrected;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And abase me not) and do not chastise me (on the day when they are raised) from the graves,
